name: Judgement of the Dead
description:
The solar barque can take you no farther. You arrive upon the shores of Duat, standing at the mouth of an ancient crypt. The final trials await you, but be warned!

The journey into the afterlife is fraught with many dangers. The path is unstable, and the creatures inside unwelcoming. Be quick of mind and feet, and take care where you stand! Else you might find yourself falling to your death!

But the hardest trials have already passed you. For even if you survive to the end, you must still be judged by the Gods for the life you lived. Are you worthy enough to enter paradise?

---

This game was created for the Extra Credits Game Jam #6 and its "Extra Retro" challenge.
